config.name: Gemini 3 Pro Preview - Pass 1 Only
config.description: Single pass extraction with Gemini 3 Pro Preview

work_packages.name: Civil & Site Work
work_packages.description: Excavation, backfill, and construction of roof drain fields and sidewalk replacement.

confidence.reasoning: Clear dimensions and details provided on sheets C1.0, C2.0, C3.0.

line_items.notes: Per Detail B/C3.0

source_reference.text_excerpt: REMOVE & REPLACE CONCRETE SIDEWALK PER DETAIL B/C3.0

line_items.notes: With (3) 24" Laterals per Civil Sheet C2.0

source_reference.text_excerpt: 30' L x 15' W x 3.5' D ROOF DRAIN FIELD WITH (3) 24" LATERALS PER CIVIL SHEET C2.0

line_items.notes: With (1) 24" CPEP per Civil Sheet C3.0

source_reference.text_excerpt: 12' L x 4' W x 3.5' D ROOF DRAIN FIELD WITH (1) 24" CPEP PER CIVIL SHEET C3.0

line_items.specifications: Maintain existing drainage patterns & provide 4" topsoil & seeding

source_reference.text_excerpt: REGRADE DISTURBED AREA TO MAINTAIN EXISTING DRAINAGE PATTERNS & PROVIDE 4" TOPSOIL & SEEDING

work_packages.name: Roofing & Thermal Protection
work_packages.description: Demolition of existing BUR, installation of new roofing system, insulation, and flashing.

confidence.reasoning: Detailed plans for demo and new work, but specific membrane manufacturer is referenced to specs not fully shown.

line_items.notes: Demo all existing BUR roofing and coverboard. Demo all existing tapered insulation at crickets.

source_reference.text_excerpt: DEMO ALL EXISTING BUR ROOFING AND COVERBOARD. DEMO ALL EXISTING TAPERED INSULATION AT CRICKETS.

line_items.notes: Includes new tapered insulation crickets to slope at 1/4" per 12" to roof drains.

source_reference.text_excerpt: NEW ROOFING SYSTEM TO BE INSTALLED PER SPECIFICATIONS AND MANUFACTURER REQUIREMENTS.

line_items.notes: See Detail 2/A2.1

source_reference.text_excerpt: NEW 24 GA. PRE-FINISHED FLASHING OVER CONT. HOLD DOWN CLEATS

line_items.notes: See Detail 11/A2.2

source_reference.text_excerpt: ROOF ACCESS HATCH 30"X54" INSTALL AT EXISTING OPENING PER 11/A2.2

line_items.notes: From access hatch to roof access ladder

source_reference.text_excerpt: PROVIDE ROOFING WALKING MATS FROM ACCESS HATCH TO ROOF ACCESS LADDER.

work_packages.description: Replacement of RTUs, Exhaust Fans, and associated ductwork/gas piping.

confidence.reasoning: Full equipment schedule and detailed roof plans provided.

source_reference.text_excerpt: RTU-1 RAQUETBALL 4 11.5 1600... DAIKIN 048

source_reference.text_excerpt: RTU-3 2ND FLOOR COMMONS 8.5 11.0 3500... DAIKIN 102

line_items.notes: See Schedule M0.1

source_reference.text_excerpt: RTU-4 1ST FLOOR LOBBY... DAIKIN 102

line_items.notes: See Schedule M0.1

source_reference.text_excerpt: RTU-5 GYM LOCKER ROOMS... DAIKIN 090

line_items.notes: See Schedule M0.1

source_reference.text_excerpt: RTU-6 GYM 20 9.8 7950... DAIKIN 240

line_items.notes: See Fan Schedule M0.1

source_reference.text_excerpt: EF-1... EF-5... GREENHECK

line_items.notes: New gas piping to RTUs, utilize proper support blocks.

source_reference.text_excerpt: PROVIDE AND INSTALL NEW GAS PIPING TO RTU, UTILIZE PROPER GAS PIPING SUPPORT BLOCKS

work_packages.name: Plumbing - Storm & Gas
work_packages.description: Roof drains, rain leaders, and gas piping connections.

confidence.reasoning: Rain leader diagrams and roof drain details are explicit.

line_items.notes: To dry well discharge, see civil for continuation.

source_reference.text_excerpt: 4" RL DN TO DRY WELL DISCHARGE, SEE CIVIL FOR CONTINUATION OUTSIDE OF BUILDING

line_items.notes: To ox tongue discharge. Provide electric heat trace.

source_reference.text_excerpt: 4" OL DN TO OX TONGUE DISCHARGE. PROVIDE AND INSTALL ELECTRIC HEAT TRACE

line_items.notes: RD-1 and OD-1

source_reference.text_excerpt: RD-1 ROOF DRAIN... OD-1 OVERFLOW ROOF DRAIN

work_packages.name: Electrical
work_packages.description: Power connections to new mechanical equipment, heat trace installation, and panel modifications.

confidence.reasoning: One-line diagrams and power plans are clear.

line_items.notes: Install 10 feet of heat trace in end of overflow-leader and ox-tongue. Provide heat trace in rain-leader from dry well to 3-feet above ground.

source_reference.text_excerpt: INSTALL 10 FEET OF HEAT TRACE IN END OF OVERFLOW-LEADER AND OX-TONGUE... PROVIDE HEAT TRACE IN RAIN-LEADER

line_items.specifications: Connect to existing circuits where noted
line_items.notes: Connect integral RTU convenience receptacles to existing circuit.

source_reference.text_excerpt: CONNECT INTEGRAL RTU CONVENIENCE RECEPTACLES TO EXISTING CIRCUIT.

line_items.notes: Provide audio visual alarm for duct smoke detector.

source_reference.text_excerpt: PROVIDE AUDIO VISUAL ALARM FOR DUCT SMOKE DETECTOR.

line_items.notes: Install new Panel 'D' around corner as shown. Move all existing circuits from demolish panel to new panel.

source_reference.text_excerpt: INSTALL NEW PANEL 'D' AROUND CORNER AS SHOWN. MOVE ALL EXISTING CIRCUITS FROM DEMOLISH PANEL TO NEW PANEL.

ai_observations.title: Additive Alternates
ai_observations.insight: Multiple sheets (A1.1, A1.2, M1.2, M2.3, E2.0, E3.0) reference 'Additive Alternate #1' and '#2' for specific roof areas and equipment. These scopes must be priced separately from the base bid.
suggested_actions: Separate line items for Alternates #1 and #2 in the estimate.
Verify exact boundaries of alternates on Sheet A1.2.

ai_observations.title: Heat Trace Coordination
ai_observations.insight: Electrical heat trace is required inside the plumbing overflow leaders and rain leaders. This requires close coordination between the Electrical and Plumbing/Civil trades to ensure the trace is installed before final piping connections or burial.
suggested_actions: Coordinate installation schedule for heat trace in downspouts.

ai_observations.title: Roofing Manufacturer Specification
ai_observations.insight: The drawings reference 'New Roofing System to be installed per specifications' but do not explicitly name the manufacturer on the plan sheets (though 'Asphaltic Coatings' is mentioned in demo notes). The specific membrane type (EPDM, TPO, PVC, Mod Bit) significantly affects price.
suggested_actions: Check Project Manual/Full Specs for roofing manufacturer.
Clarify if 'Asphaltic' implies Modified Bitumen or Built-Up Roof.

incomplete_areas: Specific roofing membrane manufacturer (referenced to external specs)
Exact routing of underground electrical to dry well (diagrammatic)
response.extraction_notes: The project involves a comprehensive roof replacement and mechanical upgrade. Key complexity lies in the Additive Alternates which affect Roofing, Mechanical, and Electrical scopes simultaneously. Civil work is limited to specific drain fields and sidewalk repair.
